knimeNode.name: Table Column to Variable
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts the values from a table column to flow variables with the row IDs as their variable name.

fullDescription.intro: Converts the values from a table column to flow variables with the row IDs as their variable name and the values in the selected column as the variable values.
fullDescription.option: Name of the column for the values.
When checked, rows with a missing value in the selected column will be skipped. When unchecked, the node execution will fail if a row contains a missing value in the selected column.
fullDescription.link: KNIME E-Learning Course: Creation and usage of Flow Variables in a KNIME workflow

ports.outPort: New flow variables with names from the row IDs.
